EndToEndId.description: Unique identification, as assigned by the initiating party, to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

Amount.description: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor.

Reference.description: Reference provided by the debtor for the sepa transfer.

TimestampCreated.description: Date and time transaction was created. Time in UTC.

TimestampSettled.description: Date and time transaction was settled. Time in UTC.

Debtor.description: The debtor information to which a debit entry will be made as a result of the transaction.

Creditor.description: The creditor information to which a debit entry will be made as a result of the transaction.

Name.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account from which to debit funds.

AccountIban.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the debtor to which a debit entry will be made as a result of the transaction.

PostalAddress.description: Debtor address that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services.

Name.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account from which to credit funds.

AccountIban.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the creditor to which a credit entry will be posted as a result of the payment transaction.

PostalAddress.description: Creditor address that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services.
